snippet.title: The Thaumaturge - Official Story Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Learn more about the story of The Thaumaturge in this latest trailer and get a peek at some of the nightmarish creatures that await you in this upcoming story-driven RPG. The Thaumaturge will be available on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG) in 2023.

The Thaumaturge is a story-driven RPG with morally ambiguous choices, taking place in the culturally diverse world of early 20th-century Warsaw. In this world, Salutors exist: esoteric beings that only Thaumaturges can truly perceive and use for their needs.

#IGN #Gaming
